title: Twin Flame
description: They can’t be apart, and they can’t be together. Artemis and Apollo have been inseparable since childhood, and they’re the perfect pair. Both of them are smart. Talented. Gorgeous.That’s what Artemis believes, but it’s not true.Apollo has hidden the truth for years. He’s damaged goods, in more ways than one.Artemis can never know. And he can never have her.
author: Amelia Wilde
